title: Design of Integrated Technology-Based Language Learning Environment: Short-Intensive Course Utilizing Simulation/VR

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational job-related knowledge
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment environment aimed at improving in-service professionals' language proficiency, operated in BYOD settings with realistic job simulations for integrated language skill training

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize over 20 job-related language expressions in VR simulation environments.
Learners can perform at least three conversation strategies suited to real-world work scenarios through simulation/VR tasks.
Learners can complete language tasks using digital tools in team-based projects and submit deliverables according to evaluation criteria.

resources: Digital Task Template for Language Assignments

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
